name: The Thrill of the Fight 2
summary:
🥊 The Thrill is Back — and Bigger Than Ever! 

Step back into the ring in Thrill of the Fight 2, the fully reimagined sequel to VR’s most beloved boxing experience — now in Early Access with enhanced multiplayer and major new features coming soon! 

Whether you're a seasoned fighter or just getting started, this update brings fresh ways to train, compete, and dominate. 

🔥 NEW in this latest Update (v0.2): 

🧠 Multiplayer Lobby System 
 Find the perfect match with new filters for Ranked, Casual, or...
